test.name: All

kw.name: Open Available Browser
kw.doc: Attempts to open a browser on the user's device from a set of supported browsers. Automatically downloads a corresponding webdriver if none is already installed.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.
Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

Attempted combinations:

BrowserDownloadError
ChromeFalseMessage: 'chromedriver' executable needs to be in PATH. Please see https://chromedriver.chromium.org/home
ChromeTrue

kw.name: Does Page Contain Element
kw.doc: Does page contain expected element

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.doc: Returns the number of elements matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Append To List
kw.doc: Adds ``values`` to the end of ``list``.

kw.name: Go Back
kw.doc: Simulates the user clicking the back button on their browser.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Table
kw.doc: Create Table object from data.

kw.name: Write table to CSV
kw.doc: Write a table as a CSV file.
